tool_description:
The Trade Events API provides data on events for U.S. businesses interested in selling their products and services overseas. These events include industry conferences, webinars, lectures, and trade missions organized by ITA and other trade agencies including:

The U.S. Trade and Development Agency
The Export-Import Bank
The State Department
The Small Business Administration.
name: Trade Events
title: Trade Events

api_list.name: /api.trade.gov/v2/trade_events/search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dataservices-trade-events-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api.trade.gov/v2/trade_events/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dataservices-trade-events-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://dataservices-trade-events-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api.trade.gov/v2/trade_events/search"

print(response.json())
